label: US Route 17 Photo 429
description: House on site affected by the construction of the Crosstown. Address: 16 Todd Street. View of street corner (corner of Todd Street and Sheppard Street). Surveyor notations on back of photo: "Dkt.: 10.524. Property owner: Wilmot J. Frasier. Tract: 125. Station: 88+80 Lt. Date: Dec. 2, 1964. In R/W - Bought." [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
